title: Reports - Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds secretly welcome third child
text:
Reports - Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds secretly welcome third child

Johannesburg – Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds have reportedly given birth to their third child.

According to a number of media reports, the couple secretly welcomed the new addition to their family two months ago.

US Weekly was the first publication to share the news, saying that a source revealed the baby is already "about 2 months old".

Blake and Ryan have yet to confirm any reports directly or disclose details about their little one.

The couple first revealed the news about their third pregnancy at the New York City premiere of Ryan's movie, Pokémon Detective Pikachu.

The addition of this baby brings their family number to five. Blake and Ryan previously welcomed two girls - James (4) and Inez (2).

Compiled by Nikita Coetzee (Sources: Channel24, E! News, US Weekly)
description: According to a number of media reports, the couple secretly welcomed the new addition to their family two months ago.
